name: Auction House
description: A bustling venue where valuables are sold to the highest bidder; adventurers can bid on rare items, sell treasures, or get caught up in bidding wars.
atmosphere: The air crackles with anticipation and the energy of competition. The sound of the auctioneer's rapid-fire speech and the sharp crack of the gavel creates a rhythm of commerce. Wealthy patrons in fine clothing examine items with practiced eyes, while the scent of money and opportunity hangs heavy in the air.
